story2.name: Sarah W.
story2.quote: The case library showed me many success stories from similar backgrounds. The essay guidance was also very professional. Highly recommended!

story3.name: Mike Z.
story3.quote: From school selection to essays, the all-in-one service helped me streamline the entire application process. Efficiency improved so much!

aiSuggestion.title: AI Suggestion
aiSuggestion.veryLow: This school has an extremely low acceptance rate. Consider it as a reach school and ensure you have enough match and safety schools.
aiSuggestion.low: This school is highly competitive. You need to stand out in test scores, activities, and essays.
aiSuggestion.moderate: This school has a moderate acceptance rate. If your profile matches well, consider it as a match school.

helpCenter.contactSupport: If you didn't find an answer, contact our support team.

howToStart.question: How do I get started with the platform?
howToStart.answer: After registering, you can first complete your profile including academic background, test scores, etc. Then browse the school database or chat with the AI assistant for personalized advice.

whatCanAIDo.question: What can the AI assistant help me with?
whatCanAIDo.answer: The AI assistant can provide school recommendations based on your background, analyze admission probability, answer study abroad questions, help plan your application timeline, and offer essay writing advice.

predictionAccuracy.question: How accurate is the admission prediction?
predictionAccuracy.answer: Our prediction model is trained on extensive historical application data with approximately 85% accuracy. However, please note that predictions are for reference only, as actual admission depends on many factors.

viewCases.question: How do I view application cases?
viewCases.answer: In the Case Library page, you can filter cases by school, major, admission result, etc. Each case includes the applicant's background and experience sharing.

dataSecure.question: Is my personal information secure?
dataSecure.answer: We strictly comply with data protection regulations and use encrypted transmission and storage. Your personal information is only used to provide services and will not be shared with third parties. You can delete your account and data at any time.

exportData.question: How do I export my application data?
exportData.answer: In the Settings page of your profile, click Export Data to download a JSON or CSV file containing all your application information.

welcome.title: Welcome to Study Abroad Platform
welcome.desc: One-stop study abroad application service to help you achieve your study abroad dreams. Let's quickly explore the core features.

schools.title: Explore Global Schools
schools.desc: Browse detailed information about world-class universities, learn about admission requirements, programs, and application deadlines.

ai.title: AI Assistant
ai.desc: Chat with the AI assistant for personalized school recommendations, essay guidance, and application strategies.

prediction.title: Admission Prediction
prediction.desc: Based on your background, intelligently predict admission probability for each school to help you choose wisely.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: Welcome to the Study Abroad Application Platform. By using this service, you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read carefully.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using this platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to any terms, please do not use this service.

services.title: Service Description
services.content: This platform provides study abroad application related information services, including but not limited to school information query, admission prediction, AI consultation, etc. We strive to provide accurate information but do not guarantee the completeness and timeliness of all information.

userConduct.title: User Conduct
userConduct.content:
You agree to:
• Provide true and accurate personal information
• Not post false or misleading content
• Not infringe on others' intellectual property or privacy rights
• Not engage in any illegal or inappropriate behavior
• Not interfere with or disrupt the normal operation of this service

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on this platform, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, audio, video, and software, is protected by intellectual property laws. Unauthorized copying, modification, distribution, or other use is prohibited.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The admission predictions and school recommendations provided by this platform are for reference only and do not constitute any form of guarantee or promise. Actual admission results are determined by each institution, and we are not responsible for the accuracy of prediction results.

termination.title: Service Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to this service at any time for any reason, including but not limited to violations of terms of service.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact:

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.content: Protecting your privacy is our top priority. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.content: The types of information we collect include:

items.academic: Academic background information (school, grades, test scores)
items.usage: Service usage data (browsing history, feature usage)
items.device: Device information (IP address, browser type, operating system)

items.analytics: Analysis and research to improve products

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We only share information in the following cases:

items.legal: Legal requirements or law enforcement cooperation
items.partners: Cooperation with trusted service providers (bound by confidentiality agreements)

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including encrypted transmission, secure storage, and access control. However, please note that no internet transmission method is 100% secure.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the following rights over your data:

items.portability: Obtain a copy of your data

cookies.title: Cookie Usage
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can manage cookie preferences through browser settings.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Significant changes will be notified via email or website notification. Continued use of the service indicates acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy-related questions, please contact our data protection team:

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Using technology and data to make every study abroad dream a reality

story.title: Our Story
story.content: The Study Abroad Platform was born from the personal experiences of a group of international students. We understand the confusion and anxiety during the application process, and have witnessed countless students miss opportunities due to information asymmetry. In 2023, we decided to change this with technology, making professional, transparent, and personalized study abroad guidance accessible to everyone.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To become the world's most trusted study abroad application platform, providing accurate school recommendations and admission predictions through AI technology and big data analysis, transforming the application process from an information war into a hopeful journey.

mission.title: Mission Driven
mission.desc: Help every student achieve their study abroad dreams

innovation.title: Continuous Innovation
innovation.desc: Enhance experience with cutting-edge AI technology

trust.title: Trust & Transparency
trust.desc: Provide real data, be a trustworthy partner

care.title: User First
care.desc: Listen to users, continuously improve products

ai.title: AI Upgrade
ai.desc: Launched AI school matching and admission prediction

expansion.title: Global Expansion
expansion.desc: Covering US, UK, Canada, Australia and more

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.desc: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to reach out
